MEDIATION REFERRALS, 98 Ohio St.3d 1485 (2003) 785 N.E.2d 469Supreme Court of Ohio. 2003.
MEDIATION REFERRALS Case Announcements and Administrative Actions March 17, 2003 The following cases have been returned to the regular docket pursuant to S.Ct.Prac.R. XIV(6)(E):
2003-0097. State ex rel. Hassan v. Indus. Comm.
Franklin App. No. 02AP-153, 2002-Ohio-6564.
